description:
Single storey roof extension and three storey side extension to Egerton Road to provide four additional self-contained residential units and modifications to two existing self-contained residential units (Use Class C3), additional commercial floorspace on the ground floor
(Class E), and cycle and waste storage; addition of windows to rear elevation at ground floor and other associated works.
decision_conditions: <span id="docs-internal-guid-2868b7d4-7fff-5bcc-e3d2-018c46f743a8"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Details, including sections at a scale of 1:20, of a bio-diverse, substrate-based extensive biodiverse roof (80mm minimum depth) including long-term management plan, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before above ground floor works commence. Such details as approved shall be implemented prior to the first occupation of the development and shall thereafter be retained and maintained.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: To enhance the character and ecology of the development, to provide undisturbed refuges for wildlife, to promote sustainable urban drainage and to enhance the performance and efficiency of the proposed building.</span></p><div><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></div></span>

<div><span style="font-family: Arial; font-size: small; white-space: pre-wrap;">A scheme for the provision and implementation of flood resilient and resistant construction details and measures for the site against surface water flood risk shall be submitted to and agreed, in writing with the LPA in consultation with the LLFA prior to the construction of the measures. The scheme shall be carried out in its entirety before the site is occupied and; constructed and completed in accordance with the approved plans in line with BS 8582:2013 code of practice for "surface water management for development sites</span></div><div><span style="font-family: Arial; font-size: small; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></div><div><span style="font-family: Arial; font-size: small; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: To protect the occupants from the risks associated with surface water flooding<br></span><font face="Arial" size="2"><span style="white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></font></div>

Prior to occupation of the development hereby approved, a certification by an accredited PV installer
confirming that an array with an overall capacity of at least 10.8 kWp has been installed on the roof of the
development shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.
REASON: In the interest of addressing climate change and securing sustainable development

<span id="docs-internal-guid-b1aa1782-7fff-638c-6026-c2799c157a8d"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Works shall not commence until full details of all materials to be used on the external surfaces of the building, including a sample panel of the proposed brickwork to be built on site, have been submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing. </span><span style="background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial; font-size: 10pt; white-space: pre-wrap;"> The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved, and shall be maintained as such thereafter.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the development is satisfactory.</span></p><div><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></div></span>

<span id="docs-internal-guid-3292cafa-7fff-988b-a3ad-8463fe9a6655"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.13809; text-align: justify; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 0pt 0pt 8pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Prior to commencement of above ground works, a detailed Construction Logistics and Management Plan covering the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority in consultation with Transport for London</span><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.13809; text-align: justify; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 8pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The construction management plan covering all phases of above ground works shall include but not be limited to the following:</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.13809; margin-left: 35.4331pt; text-align: justify; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 0pt 0pt 8pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">i) A construction method statement covering all phases of above ground works to include details of noise control measures, vibration and dust control measures including to preserve air quality;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.13809; margin-left: 35.4331pt; text-align: justify; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 0pt 0pt 8pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">ii) Details and locations of all noisy activities including mobile plant machinery, and details of the best practicable means of mitigation employed against noise and vibration in accordance with British Standard Code of Practice BS 5228.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.13809; margin-left: 35.4331pt; text-align: justify; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 0pt 0pt 8pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">iii) Details of the locations where deliveries will be undertaken; the size and number of lorries expected to access the site daily; the access arrangements (including turning provision if applicable); construction traffic routing; details of parking suspensions (if required) and the duration of construction.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.13809; margin-left: 35.4331pt; text-align: justify; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 0pt 0pt 8pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">iv) Deliveries to site and associated with removal of plant, equipment, machinery and waste from the site must only take place within the permitted hours detailed above.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.13809; margin-left: 35.4331pt; text-align: justify; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 8pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">v) Procedures for maintaining good public relations including complaint management, public consultation and liaison - Arrangements for liaison with the Councilâs Community Safety Team.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.13809; text-align: justify; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; padding: 0pt 0pt 8pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The development shall only be implemented in accordance with the details and measures approved as part of the construction management plan, which shall be maintained throughout the entire construction period.&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.13809; text-align: justify; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 8pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON</span><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">:</span><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"> To ensure that occupiers of residential premises do not suffer a loss of amenity by reason of noise nuisance during site activities</span></p><div><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(34, 34, 34); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></div></span>

<span id="docs-internal-guid-a1fbeda1-7fff-7c19-308e-d9afd7fa2afa"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Prior to occupation of the </span><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">units </span><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">hereby permitted, the commercial and residential bins stores shown on the approved plans shall be </span><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"> provided and maintained as such thereafter.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that adequate provision for the safe and secure storage of refuse and recycling is made for future occupiers, in the interest of safeguarding highway safety and the appearance of the wider area</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:6pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><br></p><div><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></div></span>

<span id="docs-internal-guid-aab88bcf-7fff-4ae9-5a34-6b50dd6f4593"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Notwithstanding the hereby approved plans, details of cycle parking shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority and approved in writing prior to the commencement of above ground construction. The plan shall include:</span></p><ul style="margin-bottom: 0px; padding-inline-start: 48px;"><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 17.4331pt; padding-left: 3.25984pt;" aria-level="1"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;" role="presentation"><span style="font-size: 10pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">space for 8 long stay residential cycles, one residential space suitable for a larger adaptable cycle, four spaces for commercial occupants and two visitor spaces</span></p></li><li dir="ltr" style="list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre; margin-left: 17.4331pt; padding-left: 3.25984pt;" aria-level="1"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;" role="presentation"><span style="font-size: 10pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">details of layout, foundation, stand type and spacing, of all cycle parking spaces&nbsp;</span></p></li></ul><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The storage spaces and stands must be retained and maintained in good working order, in accordance with the approved details, for the lifetime of the development.&nbsp;</span></p><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Reason: To ensure that adequate provision for the safe and secure storage of bicycles is made for future occupiers and in the interest of safeguarding highway safety.</span></p><br></span>

<span id="docs-internal-guid-c80f4d7c-7fff-d8f9-b85f-7e3642f82c8e"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">Prior to the first occupation of the development hereby approved a minimum of </span><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">two</span><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"> Swift nesting bricks and/or boxes shall be provided at or close to eaves level of the development hereby approved. The bricks/boxes shall be retained thereafter in perpetuity.&nbsp;</span></p><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: in the interests of biodiversity.</span></p><br></span>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
